pr_title: Remove overriding the Passive STS URL.

timeline.message: Remove overriding the Passive STS URL.

timeline.body: As discussed with @ChamathNS, removing the above logic introduced from https://github.com/wso2/carbon-identity-framework/pull/2862 will not be affected as the same logic has been added at https://github.com/wso2/carbon-identity-framework/pull/2862/files#diff-98664c0777759c45d183f9180c27614eR172-R176
